name: unown-report
effect: Lists which unown forms the trainer has caught.
short_effect: Keeps track of Unown types caught.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A report of all the discovered kinds of Unown.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A report of all the discovered kinds of Unown.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A report of all the discovered kinds of Unown.
